name: Red-Onion
description: It is a food-related website where you can order food.  In the bottom of the banner you can select which kind of food you want. You can select breakfast, lunch, dinner.  You can see you cart form there.  You have to be logged in first to see your order.  To login you have to use your email.  If you don't have a account you can create in the resister page.  In the order page you will see you orders.  This project is currently in development!
